North_Las_Vegas.KSHP: KSHP (1400 AM) is a radio station broadcasting a sports and shopping format. Licensed to North Las Vegas, Nevada, United States, it serves the Las Vegas area. The station is currently owned by Las Vegas Broadcasting LLC and features programing from Sports Byline USA. The Radio Shopping Show airs every weekday from 7-9am and from 1-6pm, plus weekends from 9a-12pm.
